spec_data.Name: perl-File-Edit-Portable
spec_data.Description:
The default behavior of perl is to read and write files using the
Operating System's (OS) default record separator (line ending). If you open
a file on an OS where the record separators are that of another OS, things
can and do break.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:32:29 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Read and write files while keeping the original line-endings intact
